channel.title: Odyssey
channel.description: Ok, so if anyone read the Odyssey or saw the movie, you might help. Halfway through the book, he has the flashback area where he goes to the different islands and the Cyclops and all that. For my English class, I have to make up a "missing" episode of what happened in this area. She said this can be based off another story. So it came to me, why not Runescape? So help me out guys, what Runescape quest would be best to fit in the Odyssey?

item.title: Odyssey
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

I enjoyed it, but the tutor kept onto me about it and giving me credit because I could “Understand the concept”, I think she thought I was retarded or something.

I’m glad I left that school, work is much better.

Read full topic

Halfway through the book, he has the flashback area where he goes to the different islands and the Cyclops and all that.
For my English class, I have to make up a “missing” episode of what happened in this area. She said this can be based off another story. So it came to me, why not Runescape?
So help me out guys, what Runescape quest would be best to fit in the Odyssey?[/quote]

One Small Favour

Actually, maybe a modification of While Guthix Sleeps, or whatever it’s called.
